title: Bug 37021: Source path displayed incorrectly in declare warning on binary files
description: Bug 37021: Source path displayed incorrectly in declare warning on binary files. The bug can be reproduced by running the code provided in the 'tests/new/binaryWarnings/' directory. It should be noted that these tests may produce false positives due to the absence of filename checking in the harness verification of messages. It has been observed that when targeting .class files from injars, the source path is displayed in the form 'app.Main.class' instead of 'app/Main.'
OB: When targeting .class files from injars, the source path in declare warning messages is displayed as 'app.Main.class'.
EB: In declare warning messages when targeting .class files from injars, the source path should be displayed as 'app/Main.'
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Run the code provided in the 'tests/new/binaryWarnings/' directory. 2. Check the declare warning messages targeting .class files from injars and observe that the source path is displayed incorrectly.
